DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate long-term safety Udenafil Patient Pulmonary Arterial Hypertension ( PAH ) . All patient receive Udenafil 1-year ( 48-weeks ) .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial Evaluate Long-term Safety Udenafil Patient With PAH
DOC.detailed_description: Pulmonary arterial Hypertension characterize progressive incerease pulmonary vascular resistance ( PVR ) lead right ventricualar failure . Udenafil inhibit PDE 5 , enzyme metabolizes cGMP , enhance cGMP mediate relaxation growth inhibition vascular smooth muscle cell , include lung .
DOC.criteria: Patients complete initial study ( DA8159_PAH_II ) , 12week , doubleblind , placebocontrolled trial
